page.description: The final step before the components are generated is to review the selected tables and views. After the components have been created, you can optionally launch your web browser to view the Tabbed UI interface.

section.description: The Finish tab shows a summary of the tables and views for which Grid Components will be created. If no additional changes are needed, clicking the *[ui:OK]* button will start the generation of the Grid Components and Tabbed UI Component.

You will be asked after clicking the *[ui:Finish]* whether or not you would like to save the Flying Start Genie configuration. Saved configurations can be loaded in the Flying Start Genie in the future.
The Flying Start Genie may take several minutes to build the components depending on the number of tables and views that were selected.

ref.link: flying start genie global properties tab
